long_description: The Filtrate Wasabi Sunglasses give you a classic square shape with a handmade tortoise-look frame for eye protection and style throughout the heat of summer. High-grade polycarbonate lenses block 88% of visible light and 100% of harmful UV rays. Tortoise frames feature gray-tint lenses for enhanced contrast in a ide range of light conditions. Dark Tortoise frames feature bronze-tint lenses, ideal for bright, direct sunlight. Filtrate RAW frames are made of unrefined acetate so that every pair has a unique organic look and feel. The Filtrate Wasabi Sunglasses include a limited-edition RAW sunglasses box and microfiber bag that doubles as a lens cleaner.
short_description: The Filtrate Wasabi Sunglasses give you a classic square shape with a handmade tortoise-look frame for eye protection and style throughout the heat of summer.
